channel.title: The Equalizer
channel.desc: Robert McCall gives up violence and wishes to lead a quiet life. However, brutal events force him to take up the fight for justice once again.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Premium Rush
channel.desc: Wilee is a bicycle messenger who rides a single-gear bike with no brakes. His routine delivery turns into a dangerous chase when his last package of the day is pursued by corrupt police officers.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: When a Stranger Calls
channel.desc: During a babysitting job, Jill, a young woman, is terrorised by a psychopathic killer's ominous calls. Years later, he returns to menace her once again.
